articles.description: Hero MotoCorp reported less than estimate January sales numbers, but its sales were up by 22 per cent to 4.33 lakh from 3.57 lakh in January. Zee Business research had estimated the numbers to be 4.8 lakh.

articles.title: Byju's US unit files for bankruptcy in Delaware - The Economic Times
articles.description: Byju's Alpha unit listed its assets in the range of $500 million to $1 billion, according to a court filing, which showed estimated creditors in the range of 100 to 199.
